Name: EPS Basic (Staged)
checklistText:
<size=21>EPS BASIC (Staged)</size>

1.	All EPS cb's - close, except:

Panel 11:
	CB EPS:
		CROSS TIE BUS - open
		DES ECA CONT - open
		DES ECA - open
		ASC ECA CONT - open

2.	All EPS cb's - close, except:

Panel 16:
	CB EPS:
		DES ECA - open
		DES ECA CONT - open
		CROSS TIE BUS - open
		CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - open
		ASC ECA CONT - open

Panel 14:
3.	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MOW sel - CDR BUS
		INVERTER sw - 2
		LMP BAT 1 & 2 tb - bp
		CDR BAT 3 & 4 tb - bp
		DES BATS tb - bp
		LUNAR BAT tb - bp
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED tb - gray
		BAT 5 BACK UP CDR FEED tb - bp
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED tb - gray
		BAT 6 BACK UP LMP FEED tb - bp``
